message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,500?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10,750?
